author: Scott Harris
title: If Dana White Really Just Got UFC 249 Done, It's Entirely on Him
description: Word came down Monday that the UFC inked a new main event for  UFC 249 . With lightweight champ Khabib Nurmagomedov pinned down by coronavirus-related travel restrictions in his native ...
content:
Justin Gaethje would face Tony Ferguson in the main event of UFC 249Gregory Payan/Associated Press
Word came down Monday that the UFC inked a new main event for UFC 249. With lightweight champ Khabib Nurmagomedov pinned down by coronavirus-related travel res… [+4245 chars]
